name: www.hrcity.in
tagline: Hrcity.in - An Initiative by Naitik Siriya
body:
Hrcity.in - An Initiative by Naitik Siriya

A community for HR professionals where you can write, share, collaborate, contribute and learn is dedicated to the Human Resources professionals from all industry backgrounds. hrcity.in is the right place for you. Join now at hrcity.in
Write. Share. Collaborate. Contribute. Interact. Learn. Grow. Our community is open to Human resource professionals of all skill levels.

www.hrcity.in
